channel.title: Catch For Us The Foxes on

item.title: January 1979
item.description: [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/mercy.md#my-facade-made-of-stone-im-deep-beneath-now-i-need-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|January, 1979.]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/mercy.md#my-facade-made-of-stone-im-deep-beneath-now-i-need-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|Saw a terrible crash and i couldn’t help but laugh,]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/mercy.md#my-facade-made-of-stone-im-deep-beneath-now-i-need-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|As my ear pressed against the past like a glass on a wall of a house in a photograph.
